trans-unit.source: Your sitemaps were successfully created. Please do not forget to setup the URL
trans-unit.target: Vaša mapa sajta je uspješno napravljena. Nemojte zaboraviti podesiti URL

trans-unit.source: Your sitemaps
trans-unit.target: Vaše mape sajta

trans-unit.source: Please set up the following sitemap URL in your Google Webmaster account:
trans-unit.target: Molimo postavite sljedeći URL mape stranice u svom Google webmaster računu:

trans-unit.source: This URL is the master sitemaps file. It refers to the following sub-sitemap files:
trans-unit.target: Ovaj URL je glavni Sitemaps datoteka. Odnosi se na ove poddatoteke sitemapa:

trans-unit.source: A minimum memory_limit value of 128 MB.
trans-unit.target: Minimalna memory_limit vrijednost 128MB.

trans-unit.source: A minimum max_execution_time value of 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: minimalna max_execution_time vrijednost 30 sekundi.

trans-unit.source: Configure your sitemap
trans-unit.target: Konfigurišite mapu Sajta

trans-unit.source: Several sitemap files will be generated depending on how your server is configured and on the number of activated products in your catalog.
trans-unit.target: Nekoliko Sitemapa stranice će biti generirano, ovisno o tome kako je vaš server konfigurisan i o broju aktiviranih proizvoda u Vašem ​​katalogu.

trans-unit.source: Check all
trans-unit.target: Označi sve

trans-unit.source: Indicate the pages that you do not want to include in your sitemap files:
trans-unit.target: Navedite stranice koje ne želite uključiti u svoju Sitemaps datoteku:

trans-unit.source: Generate sitemap
trans-unit.target: Generirajte mapu stranice

trans-unit.source: You have two ways to generate sitemaps.
trans-unit.target: Imate dva načina za generisanje mape stranice.

trans-unit.source: Using the form above (as often as needed)
trans-unit.target: Koristeći gornju formu (onoliko često koliko je potrebno)

trans-unit.source: It will automatically generate your XML sitemaps.
trans-unit.target: To će automatski generirati XML mape stranice.

trans-unit.source: Uncheck all
trans-unit.target: Odznači sve

trans-unit.source: This shop has no sitemap yet.
trans-unit.target: Ova trgovina još nema sitemap.

trans-unit.source: Generating a sitemap can take several minutes
trans-unit.target: Generirajući sitemap može potrajati nekoliko minuta

trans-unit.source: Information
trans-unit.target: Informacije

trans-unit.source: The above URL is the master sitemap file. It refers to the following sub-sitemap files:
trans-unit.target: Ovo je URL glavna Sitemap datoteka. On upućuje na ove pod-datoteke sitemapa:

trans-unit.source: Ask your hosting provider to setup a "Cron job" to load the following URL at the time you would like:
trans-unit.target: Pitajte hosting davatelja usluge za postavljanje "Cron task" da bi učitali sljedeći URL u vrijeme koje želite:
